name: Nuclear job
description:
Nuclear job takes place in a nuclear plant where you work daily. When an explosion in sector 2 damages the tanks, the unstable elements you were studying escape and fall from the walls and ceiling. You are the only one who can put things back in order. You have to sort out them with your dexterity and your incomparable speed but pay attention to the radiation that can melt your colleagues.

People involved in the creation:

Game Designer:                                                                                                                                                 Mathieu Melek / Stéphane Murça / Parmentier Arthur

Game Programmer :                                                                                                                                   Maceo Prévost / Julien Aberton

Game Artist :
Lilian Clairville / Gabriel Kenig

Sound designer :                                                                                                                                        Clément Navarro

Control :
You can only use your mouse to move the unstable elements and deposit them in the tanks of the same color. Avoid touching your colleagues, making mistakes or even leaving them in the open for too long, explosions guaranteed.
